haggle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to argue when you are trying to agree about the price of something
haggle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: tourists haggling over the price of souvenirs
Ted was haggling with the street vendors.
haggle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to argue about a price or other amount of money before reaching an agreement
haggle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The Maine Legislature has been haggling over the stateâ€™s budget for months.
